item.description:
Brunch at the Yarmouth House Restaurant & Re-Do of Yankee Swap Christmas Party!

Whether your craving is for fresh, native seafood, choice beef entrees, or the featured chef-prepared specialties, Yarmouth House is sure to please.

Yarmouth House Specials Super Sunday Specials: Complete Dinners with Soup or Salad, Dessert and Coffee Starting at $11.95! In addition, Tedâ€™s Famous Turkey Dinner is $12.95.

Everyone please bring a wrapped gift (no more than $10.00). What is a Yankee Swap? Everyone draws a number. The first person picks a gift and unwraps it. When the second person goes, they pick a gift to unwrap as well, and can either choose to keep it or swap with the first person and so on.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my infamous pink hat!
